channel.title: How do i play pvp?
channel.description: when i log into moparisthebest.com i go on the online moparscape game. no matter what I.P i put in it always sais"error connecting to server.must be down.click cancel then start server to make your own" somebody help me please. also, are there pvp servers? :confused:do you need to play on the online version of moparscape to get to pvp? :confused:

item.title: How do i play pvp?
item.dc:creator: @pirila2 pirila2
item.description:
@pirila2 wrote:

what i did was just doenload moparscape v 3.2 and log in to NO IP servers open moparscape and click file and new server and put in (example)
blaah.no-ip.info
then log in. some servers doesn’t work but most of servers i think they work… remember to change port if u need to…
u can look server status
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
and find a good server… ;D post if it works

Read full topic
